Welcome to my website! 
<img src=".\images\ds.jpg" style="width:100%">
I love data science, statistics and coding!

I am a business analyst at Lumenis, a medical device company in San Jose. I recieved my MS majoring in biostatistics at Columbia University School of Public Health. I am a highly motivated student passionate about data science, statistics, coding, machine learning, database management, consulting, risk, and technology application. I have professional experiences in Statistical Analysis, Modeling, Inference, Regression, Data Visualization, Python, SQL, and R programming. 


* Specialties:
  + R(tidyverse, caret)
  + Python(numpy, pandas, scikit-learn)
  + SQL
  + Matlab
  + PowerBI 
  + Tableau
  + SAS
